author: John Russell
comment: Have to reload it once a month and if you renew you will spend time on the phone with non english speaking folks that are dumb as dirt. When I asked to speak to someone else he claimed to be the only person there and for me to call back tomorrow to talk to an English speaking person. Why do they sell an English version but no English tech support?  The Software work ok when combined with Malwarebytes. Tech support is a 3 ring circus!

reply.author: Panda Security
reply.content:
Hello John, 
We are sorry about this. However, please note we do offer English tech support. Please, check it out in our website: https://www.pandasecurity.com/support/#homeusers
Thanks!

comment: I very like this app, but the pictures from anti-thief are so dark, not possible see who handle my cell phone. No have time for camera adjust your brightness sensor, please fix it. No more problems found.

reply.author: Panda Security
reply.content:
Hi, thanks for your feedback! We will take your opinion into consideration for further upgrades.
Kind regards,
Panda Security.

author: Sarah Ricard
comment: I use Panda across my devices: it's on my tablet, phone, and laptop. I have the paid version on my phone and will probably eventually have it on my other devices, as well. But the free version is really great, too. One of my favorite features that not every antivirus has is the privacy auditor. Sure, you can check app permissions individually, but the privacy auditor tells you with one glance if any are sketchy. Such a light antivirus, too! It's not bogged down with bloatware. The only reason why I remember it's there is because it makes me feel safer. I've had zero problems using Panda. It's a really good brand. Oh! And one more, small thing: I love how it tells you that it's a wonderful day! Such a friendly app, in more ways than one!

reply.author: Panda Security
reply.content:
Hi Sarah, thanks a  lot for such detailed revierw! We are happy to have you on team Panda! 🐼

Kind regards, 

Panda Security.

comment: This app is awesome! I have it on my tablet. It's free. I only have one free anti virus app on my tablet and that's Panda Mobile Security.😀 It protects me from any harm such as someone from the internet or some app  that may try to steal my money or payment information.

reply.author: Panda Security
reply.content:
Wow! Thanks a lot!  We are glad to know you are happy with us! 😊
Kind regards, 
Panda Security.

author: Adrian Nah
comment: You worry too much about fake license that I have a hard time keying into 5 phones within my family that now the account got mix up. Yes all have paid license. Btw you are to ambitious and greedy in wanting your customers to subcribe for 5 devices and 3years. I had to just change 2phones and swap the email account but your software do not setup to follow according to the google account eventhough say I have paid for my son's account. But after keying the given license I am still stuck to another email eventhough I have paid and extended for both. Boy I cannot wait for product to expires than I moving to another brand. And now I have paid for license that is suppose to work but not even working or able to function properly. When will you help. Till expiration date????

reply.author: Panda Security
reply.content:
Hi Adrian, as we mentioned before, the license is associated with a single account. Unfortunately, at the moment to activate the product it is necessary to use the license associated with that code.
If you are experiencing technical problems you need to contact tech support: https://www.pandasecurity.com/usa/support/#homeusers
Thank you

author: sudip das
comment: I am unable to unistall it

reply.author: Panda Security
reply.content:
If you want to uninstall the app and you have used Anti-theft feature, you need to disable the Uninstall Protection from the application Settings, or disable Device Administration permissions from phone settings/security/device administrators:

Have a look at this help in case of doubt:

http://www.pandasecurityusa.com/support/cards/80803/?id=80803
